metadata.context: Comprehensive consent management framework for ACP vs A2A research

gdpr_consent_assessment.consent_definition: GDPR Article 4(11): freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous indication of agreement

freely_given.requirement: No coercion, conditioning, or significant imbalance
freely_given.research_application: Participation in research must be voluntary without academic or economic pressure
freely_given.implementation: Clear statement that participation is optional, no academic consequences

specific.research_application: Separate consent for each research activity and data type
specific.implementation: Granular consent options for different data collection activities

informed.requirement: Clear information about processing before consent
informed.research_application: Comprehensive information about research purposes, data use, and rights
informed.implementation: Detailed consent information sheet with plain language explanations

unambiguous.research_application: Active opt-in mechanisms, no pre-ticked boxes
unambiguous.implementation: Explicit consent checkboxes and digital signatures

withdrawal_requirements.ease_of_withdrawal: Withdrawal must be as easy as giving consent
withdrawal_requirements.ongoing_effect: Withdrawal affects future processing, not lawful past processing
withdrawal_requirements.implementation: One-click withdrawal mechanisms, clear withdrawal procedures

informed_consent_elements.research_purpose: Clear explanation of research objectives and significance
informed_consent_elements.procedures: Detailed description of what participation involves
informed_consent_elements.voluntary_participation: Right to refuse or withdraw without penalty
informed_consent_elements.contact_information: Researcher and ethics committee contact details

special_populations.vulnerable_groups: Additional protections for elderly, disabled, or economically disadvantaged participants
special_populations.proxy_consent: Conditions under which proxy consent may be acceptable

consent_requirements.consent_specificity: Specific consent for each processing purpose
Specific consent for each processing purpose

system_overview.purpose: Comprehensive consent management for ACP/A2A research
system_overview.scope: All research phases requiring data collection

tier_1_basic.data_covered: Non-personal technical data, anonymized performance metrics
tier_1_basic.consent_mechanism: Online consent form with basic information

tier_2_standard.scope: Device operation data and communication metadata
tier_2_standard.data_covered: Quasi-personal data with medium privacy risk
tier_2_standard.consent_mechanism: Enhanced consent form with detailed privacy information
tier_2_standard.withdrawal_method: Online withdrawal portal with immediate effect

tier_3_sensitive.scope: Energy consumption patterns and location data
tier_3_sensitive.data_covered: Personal data with high privacy risk

literature_review_phase.consent_needed: No new consent - using published data only
literature_review_phase.information_required: Notification of research purpose and publication intent

comparative_analysis_phase.consent_needed: Tier 2-3 consent for real-world data collection
comparative_analysis_phase.information_required: Detailed consent form with protocol comparison explanation

prototype_development_phase.consent_needed: Tier 3 explicit consent for live data testing
prototype_development_phase.information_required: Enhanced consent with prototype testing specifics

enhanced_consent_form.language_level: Clear, accessible language with technical appendix

information_sheets.participant_rights: Detailed explanation of data subject rights
information_sheets.data_protection_summary: Plain language explanation of technical safeguards

consent_records.digital_signatures: Secure digital signature collection and storage
consent_records.consent_timestamps: Detailed logging of consent actions and timestamps
consent_records.version_control: Tracking of consent form versions and participant responses
